//: sorry moreiotas, but naming is really difficult for me.
hextext.page.text.0: I found a new type of iota that can make the strings appear in different styles. It seems that you need to use a specific spell to make this iota...
hextext.page.text.make: Remove a string or string list from the stack and returns the $(#e2d3f0)$(l)Text$() that string parses as (or $(a)$(l)Empty Text$() if it doesn't parse).
hextext.page.text.get_name: Takes an entity and returns that entity's name. If it is an item entity, return the item's name.
hextext.page.text.set_name: Takes a $(#e2d3f0)$(l)Text$() and an entity, and sets that entities name to the given $(#e2d3f0)$(l)Text$(). If the entity is an item entity, rename the item.
